node.title: Going on holiday
node.metaDescription: Understand your holiday allowance and how to book time off, plus how compassionate, carers leave and sabbaticals work.

node.title: Grievance
node.metaDescription: How we deal with behaviour that falls below our standards, and what to do if you want to complain about a colleague.

node.title: Parental leave
node.metaDescription: When to tell your manager if you’re pregnant, how maternity and paternity leave work, and how to share paternal leave.

node.title: Pay and money
node.metaDescription: When we get paid, making sense of payslips, changing your bank details, P60s and P45s, problems with pay, working overtime and how our pay is calculated.

node.title: Time off sick
node.metaDescription: What to do if you’re ill today, doctor’s appointments, pay when you’re off work, how we manage long term illness and frequent illness.
